id: 7/Backup kubernetes namespace with Kasten10 by Veeam
title: Backup kubernetes namespace with Kasten10 by Veeam
description: This documentation provides a step-by-step guide on how to configure backup policies using the GCP Veeam service. By following these instructions, you can effectively manage and store backups for your namespaces in Google Cloud Platform (GCP). Video tutorials are included to demonstrate the configuration process.
